column4: hey I need some help, I would like to install ubuntu on MAC, so is it possible?
I dont know I going to borrow mac tumorrow from my friend and I`m going to buy it if works with ubuntu
<d90> I`m going to borrow mac book from my friend tomorrow, configuration is 10GB hard disk
that's a prehistoric g3 mac, i'll assume
I'd recommed using the 6.06 LTS (Dapper) version for it
read above, ppc is no longer officially supported.... and having only 192 MB ram i'd go for xubuntu
make sure not pay more than, say, 100 bucks if it's a notebook
yes I`m going to pay it 50euros
fair deal.... run xubuntu 6.06 and you'll be fine
